<<<<<<< HEAD
Christian consolations taught from five heads in religion I. Faith. II. Hope. III. The Holy Spirit. IV. Prayer. V. The Sacraments. Written by a learned prelate. Learned prelate.
[18], 219, [3] p., plate
printed for R. Royston, bookseller to his most excellent Majesty, London : 1671.
"I. Faith" to "IV. Prayer" are connected by a complex system of brackets. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======
